ortogonal_intro_1.texto: Orthogonal architecture aims to reduce unnecessary dependencies.
ortogonal_intro_1.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ eɪmz tə ɹɪˈdus ˌʌnˈnɛsəˌsɛɹi dɪˈpɛndənsiz

ortogonal_intro_2.texto: The main goal is to increase cohesion between components.
ortogonal_intro_2.fonetica: ðə meɪn ɡoʊl ɪz tə ɪnˈkɹis koʊˈhiʒən bɪˈtwin kəmˈpoʊnənts

ortogonal_intro_3.texto: Orthogonality allows changes in one module to not affect others.
ortogonal_intro_3.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti əˈlaʊz ˈʧeɪnʤɪz ɪn wʌn ˈmɑʤul tə nɑt əˈfɛkt ˈʌðɚz

ortogonal_intro_4.texto: Each component should have a single clear responsibility.
ortogonal_intro_4.fonetica: iʧ kəmˈpoʊnənt ʃʊd hæv ə ˈsɪŋɡəl klɪɹ ɹɪˌspɑnsəˈbɪlɪti

ortogonal_intro_6.texto: An orthogonal system is easier to test.
ortogonal_intro_6.fonetica: ən ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəm ɪz ˈiziɚ tə tɛst

ortogonal_intro_10.texto: High cohesion ensures clarity in responsibilities.
ortogonal_intro_10.fonetica: haɪ koʊˈhiʒən ɪnˈʃʊɚz ˈklɛɹɪti ɪn ɹɪˌspɑnsəˈbɪlɪtiz

ortogonal_intro_11.texto: Local changes should not have global impact.
ortogonal_intro_11.fonetica: ˈloʊkəl ˈʧeɪnʤɪz ʃʊd nɑt hæv ˈɡloʊbəl ˈɪmpækt

ortogonal_intro_12.texto: Modularity is key to achieving orthogonality.
ortogonal_intro_12.fonetica: ˌmɑʤəˈlæɹɪti ɪz ki tə əˈʧivɪŋ ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

ortogonal_intro_13.texto: Orthogonality is achieved with well-defined interfaces.
ortogonal_intro_13.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti ɪz əˈʧivd wɪð wɛl dɪˈfaɪnd ˈɪntɚfeɪsɪz

ortogonal_intro_14.texto: Clear contracts between modules are essential.
ortogonal_intro_14.fonetica: klɪɹ ˈkɑntɹækts bɪˈtwin ˈmɑʤulz ɑɹ ɪˈsɛnʃəl

ortogonal_intro_15.texto: An orthogonal system minimizes error risks.
ortogonal_intro_15.fonetica: ən ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəm ˈmɪnɪmaɪzɪz ˈɛɚɹ ɹɪsks

ortogonal_intro_17.texto: Simplicity is a consequence of orthogonal design.
ortogonal_intro_17.fonetica: sɪmˈplɪsɪti ɪz ə ˈkɑnsəkwəns əv ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl dɪˈzaɪn

ortogonal_intro_18.texto: Each orthogonal module should be understandable by itself.
ortogonal_intro_18.fonetica: iʧ ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈmɑʤul ʃʊd bi ˌʌndɚˈstændəbəl baɪ ɪtˈsɛlf

ortogonal_intro_19.texto: Database changes should not affect business logic.
ortogonal_intro_19.fonetica: ˈdeɪtəˌbeɪs ˈʧeɪnʤɪz ʃʊd nɑt əˈfɛkt ˈbɪznəs ˈlɑʤɪk

ortogonal_intro_22.texto: Orthogonal systems are easier to scale.
ortogonal_intro_22.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz ɑɹ ˈiziɚ tə skeɪl

ortogonal_intro_25.texto: Interface changes should not propagate throughout the system.
ortogonal_intro_25.fonetica: ˈɪntɚfeɪs ˈʧeɪnʤɪz ʃʊd nɑt ˈpɹɑpəˌɡeɪt ˌθɹuˈaʊt ðə ˈsɪstəm

ortogonal_intro_27.texto: Orthogonal design is more resistant to technological changes.
ortogonal_intro_27.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl dɪˈzaɪn ɪz mɔɹ ɹɪˈzɪstənt tə ˌtɛknəˈlɑʤɪkəl ˈʧeɪnʤɪz

ortogonal_intro_30.texto: Orthogonality is a key principle of good architecture.
ortogonal_intro_30.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti ɪz ə ki ˈpɹɪnsəpəl əv ɡʊd ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ

ortogonal_mid_32.texto: Orthogonal components are easy to replace.
ortogonal_mid_32.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl kəmˈpoʊnənts ɑɹ ˈizi tə ɹiˈpleɪs

ortogonal_mid_34.texto: Each layer should only know what's necessary.
ortogonal_mid_34.fonetica: iʧ ˈleɪɚɹ ʃʊd ˈoʊnli noʊ ˈwɑts ˈnɛsəˌsɛɹi

ortogonal_mid_37.texto: Errors are better isolated in orthogonal systems.
ortogonal_mid_37.fonetica: ˈɛɚɹz ɑɹ ˈbɛtɚɹ ˈaɪsəleɪtɪd ɪn ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz

ortogonal_mid_38.texto: Orthogonality facilitates work in large teams.
ortogonal_mid_38.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti fəˈsɪləteɪts wɝk ɪn lɑɹʤ timz

ortogonal_mid_39.texto: Each team can work on a module without interference.
ortogonal_mid_39.fonetica: iʧ tim kæn wɝk ɑn ə ˈmɑʤul wɪˈθaʊt ˌɪntɚˈfɪɹəns

ortogonal_mid_44.texto: Clean design relies on orthogonal principles.
ortogonal_mid_44.fonetica: klin dɪˈzaɪn ɹɪˈlaɪz ɑn ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈpɹɪnsəpəlz

ortogonal_mid_45.texto: Orthogonality is the foundation for scalable architectures.
ortogonal_mid_45.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti ɪz ðə faʊnˈdeɪʃən fɔɹ ˈskeɪləbəl ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚz

ortogonal_mid_47.texto: Orthogonal systems have fewer side effects.
ortogonal_mid_47.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz hæv ˈfjuɚɹ saɪd ɪˈfɛkts

ortogonal_mid_49.texto: Modularity and orthogonality complement each other.
ortogonal_mid_49.fonetica: ˌmɑʤəˈlæɹɪti ænd ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti ˈkɑmplɪmɛnt iʧ ˈʌðɚ

ortogonal_mid_50.texto: An orthogonal module is independent of others.
ortogonal_mid_50.fonetica: ən ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈmɑʤul ɪz ˌɪndɪˈpɛndənt əv ˈʌðɚz

ortogonal_mid_51.texto: Changes are limited to the affected area.
ortogonal_mid_51.fonetica: ˈʧeɪnʤɪz ɑɹ ˈlɪmɪtɪd tə ði əˈfɛktɪd ˈɛɹiə

ortogonal_mid_53.texto: Diagrams are better understood in orthogonal systems.
ortogonal_mid_53.fonetica: ˈdaɪəˌɡɹæmz ɑɹ ˈbɛtɚɹ ˌʌndɚˈstʊd ɪn ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz

ortogonal_mid_55.texto: Microservices should maintain orthogonality between them.
ortogonal_mid_55.fonetica: ˈmaɪkɹoʊˌsɝvɪsɪz ʃʊd meɪnˈteɪn ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti bɪˈtwin ðɛm

ortogonal_mid_56.texto: Orthogonality is essential in distributed architectures.
ortogonal_mid_56.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti ɪz ɪˈsɛnʃəl ɪn dɪˈstɹɪbjətɪd ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚz

ortogonal_mid_59.texto: An orthogonal service can evolve without affecting others.
ortogonal_mid_59.fonetica: ən ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɝvɪs kæn ɪˈvɑlv wɪˈθaʊt əˈfɛktɪŋ ˈʌðɚz

ortogonal_adv_62.texto: Each change has predictable impact in an orthogonal system.
ortogonal_adv_62.fonetica: iʧ ˈʧeɪnʤ hæz pɹɪˈdɪktəbəl ˈɪmpækt ɪn ən ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəm

ortogonal_adv_64.texto: Orthogonal systems allow shorter delivery cycles.
ortogonal_adv_64.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz əˈlaʊ ˈʃɔɹtɚɹ dɪˈlɪvəɹi ˈsaɪkəlz

ortogonal_adv_66.texto: Orthogonal modules are easier to replace with new versions.
ortogonal_adv_66.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈmɑʤulz ɑɹ ˈiziɚ tə ɹiˈpleɪs wɪð nu ˈvɝʒənz

ortogonal_adv_67.texto: Orthogonality facilitates adoption of new technologies.
ortogonal_adv_67.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti fəˈsɪləteɪts əˈdɑpʃən əv nu tɛkˈnɑləʤiz

ortogonal_adv_68.texto: Orthogonal design adapts better to change.
ortogonal_adv_68.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl dɪˈzaɪn əˈdæpts ˈbɛtɚɹ tə ˈʧeɪnʤ

ortogonal_adv_70.texto: Hexagonal architecture benefits from port and adapter orthogonality.
ortogonal_adv_70.fonetica: hɛkˈsæɡənəl ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ ˈbɛnəfɪts fɹəm pɔɹt ænd əˈdæptɚɹ ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

ortogonal_adv_71.texto: Orthogonal patterns help maintain system consistency.
ortogonal_adv_71.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈpætɚnz hɛlp meɪnˈteɪn ˈsɪstəm kənˈsɪstənsi

ortogonal_adv_73.texto: External quality also benefits from orthogonality.
ortogonal_adv_73.fonetica: ɪkˈstɝnəl ˈkwɑlɪti ˈɔlsoʊ ˈbɛnəfɪts fɹəm ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

ortogonal_adv_74.texto: Clients receive more stable software thanks to orthogonality.
ortogonal_adv_74.fonetica: ˈklaɪənts ɹɪˈsiv mɔɹ ˈsteɪbəl ˈsɔftwɛɹ θæŋks tə ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

ortogonal_adv_75.texto: Orthogonality supports the dependency inversion principle.
ortogonal_adv_75.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti səˈpɔɹts ðə dɪˈpɛndənsi ɪnˈvɝʒən ˈpɹɪnsəpəl

ortogonal_adv_77.texto: Orthogonality aligns with Clean Architecture philosophy.
ortogonal_adv_77.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti əˈlaɪnz wɪð klin ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ fɪˈlɑsəfi

ortogonal_adv_78.texto: Clean Architecture seeks independence and orthogonality between layers.
ortogonal_adv_78.fonetica: klin ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ siks ˌɪndɪˈpɛndəns ænd ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti bɪˈtwin ˈleɪɚz

ortogonal_adv_79.texto: Orthogonality reduces the impact of local failures.
ortogonal_adv_79.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti ɹɪˈdusɪz ði ˈɪmpækt əv ˈloʊkəl ˈfeɪljɚz

ortogonal_adv_80.texto: Failures are better isolated in orthogonal systems.
ortogonal_adv_80.fonetica: ˈfeɪljɚz ɑɹ ˈbɛtɚɹ ˈaɪsəleɪtɪd ɪn ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz

ortogonal_adv_82.texto: Security improves because side effects are reduced.
ortogonal_adv_82.fonetica: sɪˈkjʊɹɪti ɪmˈpɹuvz bɪˈkɔz saɪd ɪˈfɛkts ɑɹ ɹɪˈdust

ortogonal_adv_83.texto: Orthogonal systems are more robust against changes.
ortogonal_adv_83.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz ɑɹ mɔɹ ɹoʊˈbʌst əˈɡɛnst ˈʧeɪnʤɪz

ortogonal_adv_85.texto: Orthogonal projects have lower long-term costs.
ortogonal_adv_85.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈpɹɑʤɛkts hæv ˈloʊɚɹ ˈlɔŋˈtɝm kɔsts

ortogonal_adv_89.texto: An orthogonal system is more resilient to business changes.
ortogonal_adv_89.fonetica: ən ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəm ɪz mɔɹ ɹɪˈzɪljənt tə ˈbɪznəs ˈʧeɪnʤɪz

dominio_datos_92.texto: Domain and data models remain separate.
dominio_datos_92.fonetica: doʊˈmeɪn ænd ˈdeɪtə ˈmɑdəlz ɹɪˈmeɪn ˈsɛpəɹət

adaptabilidad_negocio_97.texto: Business adaptability is greater with orthogonality.
adaptabilidad_negocio_97.fonetica: ˈbɪznəs əˌdæptəˈbɪlɪti ɪz ˈɡɹeɪtɚɹ wɪð ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

estructura_simple_98.texto: Orthogonal designs are based on simple structures.
estructura_simple_98.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl dɪˈzaɪnz ɑɹ ˈbeɪst ɑn ˈsɪmpəl ˈstɹʌkʧɚz

principio_evolucion_100.texto: Orthogonality is a key principle for evolution.
principio_evolucion_100.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti ɪz ə ki ˈpɹɪnsəpəl fɔɹ ˌɛvəˈluʃən

resiliencia_errores_104.texto: Orthogonal systems are more resilient to errors.
resiliencia_errores_104.fonetica: ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz ɑɹ mɔɹ ɹɪˈzɪljənt tə ˈɛɚɹz

alineacion_estrategia_106.texto: Orthogonality allows aligning architecture with strategy.
alineacion_estrategia_106.fonetica: ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti əˈlaʊz əˈlaɪnɪŋ ˈɑɹkɪtɛkʧɚ wɪð ˈstɹætəʤi

transparencia_arquitectura_107.texto: Architectural transparency is a benefit of orthogonality.
transparencia_arquitectura_107.fonetica: ˌɑɹkɪˈtɛkʧɚəl tɹænsˈpɛɹənsi ɪz ə ˈbɛnəfɪt əv ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

coherencia_diseno_109.texto: Design coherence is strengthened with orthogonality.
coherencia_diseno_109.fonetica: dɪˈzaɪn koʊˈhɪɹəns ɪz ˈstɹɛŋθənd wɪð ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

claridad_mensajes_111.texto: Messages between modules should be clear and orthogonal.
claridad_mensajes_111.fonetica: ˈmɛsɪʤɪz bɪˈtwin ˈmɑʤulz ʃʊd bi klɪɹ ænd ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl

gobernanza_arquitectura_113.texto: Good architectural governance is based on orthogonality.
gobernanza_arquitectura_113.fonetica: ɡʊd ˌɑɹkɪˈtɛkʧɚəl ˈɡʌvɚnəns ɪz ˈbeɪst ɑn ɔɹθɑɡəˈnælɪti

separacion_intereses_115.texto: Separation of concerns is key in orthogonal systems.
separacion_intereses_115.fonetica: ˌsɛpəˈɹeɪʃən əv kənˈsɝnz ɪz ki ɪn ɔɹˈθɑɡənəl ˈsɪstəmz
